name: search
html:
<!doctype html>
<html class="no-js" lang="en"><!-- specify language: http://www.w3.org/TR/html401/struct/dirlang.html#h-8.1 -->
<head prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#"><!-- enable Open Graph: http://ogp.me/ -->

    <!-- charset & http-equiv may be set via response header: https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate/blob/master/doc/html.md#x-ua-compatible -->
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">

    <title> Demo Project</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Manage your front-end project in unique views and reusable components.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="front-end, guide, patternlab, reusable, components, modules">
    <meta property="og:image" content="http://voorhoede.github.io/front-end-guide/assets/components/app-logo/demo-logo.png">
    <meta property="og:url"   content="http://voorhoede.github.io/front-end-guide/">
    <!-- optionally add more Open Graph metadata: http://ogp.me/#metadata -->
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"><!-- specify viewport: https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/insights/ConfigureViewport -->
    <!-- Place favicon.ico and apple-touch-icon(s) in the root directory -->

    <!-- Enable styling differentiation between JavaScript and non-JavaScript enabled browsers -->
    <script>(function (e) { e.className = e.className.replace('no-js', 'js'); }(document.documentElement));</script>
    <!-- Enable styling of HTML5 sectioning elements in legacy browsers. Simplified inline version of HTML5Shiv (https://github.com/aFarkas/html5shiv) for enhanced performance -->
    <!--[if lt IE 9]>
    <script>
        (function (d, a) { var l = a.length; while(l--){ d.createElement(a[l]); } }(document,
        ['HEADER', 'NAV', 'SECTION', 'FOOTER', 'ARTICLE', 'MAIN', 'FIGCAPTION', 'FIGURE', 'ASIDE']));
    </script>
    <![endif]-->

    
        <!-- Include stylesheets here. Concatenate & minify for performance: https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/insights/MinifyResources -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/index.css">
    
</head>
<body data-module="views/search">

<!-- app-header component -->
<header role="banner" class="app-header" data-component="app-header">
    <a class="app-logo" href="../..//views/_guide-index/_guide-index.html" rel="home" title="to homepage" data-component="app-logo">
    <!-- link to home: http://microformats.org/wiki/rel-home -->
    <h1>
        <!-- vector image with bitmap fallback: https://twitter.com/scottjehl/status/369190249437483008 -->
        <!-- specify image dimensions for performance: http://www.feedthebot.com/pagespeed/image-dimensions.html -->
        <img alt="[Logo]"
             src="../../assets/components/app-logo/demo-logo.svg"
             onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='../../assets/components/app-logo/demo-logo.png';"
             width="75" height="75"
             >
        
        Demo Project
    </h1>
</a>

    <!-- Quick menu (skipnav) to directly jump to specific sections: http://www.jimthatcher.com/skipnav.htm -->
    <nav class="app-header-quick-menu">
        <h2 class="a11y-sr-only">Quick menu</h2>
        <ul class="flat-list">
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#content">Jump to content</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#main-menu">Jump to main menu</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#search">Jump to search</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#meta-menu">Jump to meta menu</a></li>
            <li><a class="menu-link a11y-kb-only" href="#user">Jump to user menu</a></li>
        </ul>
    </nav>
    <!-- search-menu component -->
<!-- Mark search controls for enhanced a11y: http://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/roles#search -->
<div role="search" class="search-menu"
     data-search-menu
     data-expandible-open-on-focus="true"
     data-expandible-close-on-blur="true"
     data-component="search-menu">
    <a id="search" rel="search" href="/views/search/search.html"
       class="menu-link"
       data-expandible-handle="toggle">
        <span class="search-menu-open  app-icon-search"></span>
        <span class="search-menu-close app-icon-cross"></span>
        <span class="a11y-sr-only">Search</span>
    </a>
    <form method="GET" action="/views/search/search.html"
          class="search-menu-form"
          data-expandible-content>
        <label>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Keywords</span>
            <input type="search" name="q" placeholder="keyword(s)" />
        </label>
        <button>
            <span class="app-icon-search"></span>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Search front-end-guide</span>
        </button>
    </form>
</div>
<!-- /search-menu -->

</header>
<!-- /app-header -->



<main id="content" role="main" tabindex="-1">
    <!-- tabindex fixes focus issue, alternatively use generic script: http://www.nczonline.net/blog/2013/01/15/fixing-skip-to-content-links/ -->
    <!-- @todo: add nav[role="navigation"] as TOC -->
    
    <h1>Search</h1>

    <!-- Mark search controls for enhanced a11y: http://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/roles#search -->
    <form role="search" method="GET" action="/views/search/search.html">
        <label>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Keywords</span>
            <input type="search" name="q" placeholder="keyword(s)" />
        </label>
        <button>
            <span class="app-icon icon-search"></span>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Search front-end-guide</span>
        </button>
    </form>

    <section>
        <h2>XX Results</h2>
    </section>

</main>



<!-- app-footer component -->
<footer role="contentinfo" class="app-footer" data-component="app-footer">
    <p>Demo project © 2014</p>
</footer>
<!-- /app-footer -->



    <!-- Include scripts here. Concatenate & minify for performance: https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/insights/MinifyResources -->
    <script src="../../assets/index.js"></script>
    <script>(function(doc){
	'use strict';

	var isCapableBrowser = ('classList' in doc.documentElement);
	if(!isCapableBrowser){ return; }

	var moduleId = doc.querySelector('[data-module]').getAttribute('data-module');
	var components = doc.querySelectorAll('[data-component]');

	annotateComponents();

	if(window.location.href.indexOf('annotate') > 0){ toggleAnnotations(true); }
	window.toggleAnnotations = toggleAnnotations;
	//toggleAnnotations();

	// setup two-way communication with parent frame
	if(window.top) {
		window.addEventListener('load', function (event) {
			var path = window.location.pathname;
			window.top.postMessage({
				moduleId: moduleId
			}, '*');
		}, false);

		window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
			var message = event.data;
			if(message.fromViewer && message.showAnnotations !== undefined){
				toggleAnnotations(message.showAnnotations);
			}
		});
	}

	function annotateComponents() {
		[].forEach.call(components, function(component){
			var name = component.getAttribute('data-component');
			var label = doc.createElement('a');
			label.innerHTML = name;
			label.href = '../../components/' + name + '/' + name + '-preview.html';
			label.classList.add('debug-label');
			component.appendChild(label);
		});
	}

	function toggleAnnotations(show) {
		[].forEach.call(components, function(component){
			component.classList.toggle('debug-component', show);
		});
	}
}(document));</script>
    <style type="text/css">
.debug-component {
	outline: 2px solid black;
	outline-offset: -2px;
}

.debug-label {
	display: none;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	z-index: 999;
	color: white !important;
	padding: .2em .5em;
	background: black;
}

.debug-component .debug-label {
	display: block;
}</style>

</body>
</html>
css:
.a11y-sr-only,
.a11y-kb-only {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
}
.a11y-kb-only:active,
.a11y-kb-only:focus {
  clip: auto;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: visible;
  position: static;
  width: auto;
}
.icon-search:before {
  content: "search";
}
.icon-close:before {
  content: "x";
}
.flat-list {
  list-style: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
.flat-list li {
  padding-left: 0;
}
.flat-list li:before {
  content: '';
}
.list-inline {
  list-style: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
.list-inline li {
  padding-left: 0;
}
.list-inline li:before {
  content: '';
}
.list-inline > li {
  display: inline-block;
  padding-left: 5px;
  padding-right: 5px;
}
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
*:before,
*:after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
html {
  font-size: 10px;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
body {
  font-family: Arial;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  line-height: 1.5em;
  color: black;
  width: 90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0;
}
a:link {
  color: #428bca;
}
a:visited {
  color: #245682;
}
a:hover,
a:focus {
  color: #92bce0;
}
/* app-footer component */
.app-footer {
  position: relative;
}
/* app-logo component */
.app-logo img {
  width: 1.5em;
  height: auto;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1000px) {
  .app-logo img {
    width: 2.5em;
  }
}
a img {
  border: none;
}
.search-menu {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}
.search-menu .search-menu-open {
  display: inherit;
}
.search-menu .search-menu-close {
  display: none;
}
@media print {
  .search-menu {
    display: none;
  }
}
.search-menu-form {
  display: none;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  white-space: nowrap;
  padding: .5em;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded {
  background-color: #5bc0de;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded .search-menu-open {
  display: none;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded .search-menu-close {
  display: inherit;
}
.search-menu.is-expanded .search-menu-form {
  display: block;
  background-color: #5bc0de;
}
.app-icon-search {
  content: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M15.5 14h-.79l-.28-.27c.98-1.14 1.57-2.62 1.57-4.23 0-3.59-2.91-6.5-6.5-6.5s-6.5 2.91-6.5 6.5 2.91 6.5 6.5 6.5c1.61 0 3.09-.59 4.23-1.57l.27.28v.79l5 4.99 1.49-1.49-4.99-5zm-6 0c-2.49 0-4.5-2.01-4.5-4.5s2.01-4.5 4.5-4.5 4.5 2.01 4.5 4.5-2.01 4.5-4.5 4.5z"/><path d="M0 0h24v24h-24z" fill="none"/></svg>');
}
.app-icon-close {
  content: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19 6.41l-1.41-1.41-5.59 5.59-5.59-5.59-1.41 1.41 5.59 5.59-5.59 5.59 1.41 1.41 5.59-5.59 5.59 5.59 1.41-1.41-5.59-5.59z"/><path d="M0 0h24v24h-24z" fill="none"/></svg>');
}
.app-header {
  *zoom: 1;
  position: relative;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #428bca;
}
.app-header:before,
.app-header:after {
  display: table;
  content: "";
}
.app-header:after {
  clear: both;
}
.app-header .app-logo {
  float: left;
}
.app-header .meta-menu {
  float: left;
}
.app-header .user-menu {
  float: right;
}
.app-header .search-menu {
  float: right;
}
.app-header-quick-menu {
  position: absolute;
  left: 1em;
  top: 5em;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=../../views/search/search.css.map */
template:
{% extends "views/_base-view/base-view.html" %}

{% block content %}
    <h1>Search</h1>

    <!-- Mark search controls for enhanced a11y: http://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/roles#search -->
    <form role="search" method="GET" action="/views/search/search.html">
        <label>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Keywords</span>
            <input type="search" name="q" placeholder="keyword(s)" />
        </label>
        <button>
            <span class="app-icon icon-search"></span>
            <span class="a11y-sr-only">Search {{ pkg.name }}</span>
        </button>
    </form>

    <section>
        <h2>XX Results</h2>
    </section>
{% endblock %}
